attributes.action: Completely sort out Knife crime And make our children Feel safe
attributes.additional_details: Give bigger sentences for carrying a knife Have more police around more cameras and ban Balaclavas once and for all!
attributes.background: Make a huge difference to The UK and sort out knife Crime once and for all and allow Children To walk the streets without fearing for their lives every time they do walk.

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Mandatory 10-year sentence for possession of a knife: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/636853

Create a dedicated Minister for Knife Crime Prevention: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/639631

Ban wearing balaclavas in public: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/647362
